name: push up
instructions: Start in a high plank position with hands under shoulders.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: goblet squat
instructions: Hold a dumbbell at chest height.
Sit hips back and squat down.
Drive through midfoot to stand tall.

name: bent over row
instructions: Hinge at hips with a flat back.
Pull the weight toward your hip.

name: plank
instructions: Elbows under shoulders, body in a straight line.

name: single leg deadlift
instructions: Stand tall, shift weight to one leg.
Hinge at the hips while extending the free leg back.
